arStrings.szText: I might ask you the same, this is no place for sight-seeing.

Cagey, suspicious. Recognizes player as someone wanted for crimes by the Knights Penitent, waiting to see how this plays out.  Edgar is a foremer crusading Knight from up north and speaks in a somewhat formal manner, unusual for a desert traveler.
I was helping these people escape Caldeum when we were attacked by monsters. Now we're split up, and the damn things just keep coming.
I could certainly use an extra sword, just until we get further down the road. Cover us while we move ahead and find our lost sheep.
